Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir,

Lúcio Antônio de Santa Ana, soldier of the 3rd Battalion of Hunters, who fell ill at the estancia of Padre Feliciano, when this battalion was marching to join the forces coming from Rio Grande, was taken prisoner on the 25th of last November, when the rebel force led by Agostinho was defeated; and as I was informed of these circumstances, I removed him from the grouping of prisoners to deliver him to the battalion; and now I present him to Your Excellency.

God guard Your Excellency
Camp at Restinga Seca, December 8, 1841.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Antônio Correia Seara,
Interim Brigadier Commander of the Forces in Operation.

Francisco Manuel Accioli,
Interim Captain Commander.
